nodes.bodyText: We already have similar function in MessagingUtil.startProcessTracingSpan , should we use that here ?

I think the method in MessageUtils seems to be unused and doesn't seem to be the right place to have this method in. So, keeping it close to where it's used. We can move this to the util class if there are more places this is needed.

Is this how we are linking the received message with original sent message ?
For example , how it is done in python https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-python/pull/14777/files#diff-98cad0f4853c6ad2e604c286a38004b3e11ad75fa697cb86638b1c4944b509eeR285
If the received message has the application properties key = Diagnostic-Id populated, we should a new activity and add a link to the Process activity
Yes, the diagnostic id is linked on line 269. This is also how we are doing in Event Hubs.
